queryDescription: If the client/customer has any queries or situation related account closure.
If the client/customer has any queries or situation related to the funds in his account.

If the client/customer has any queries or situation related to modifying/changing/updating/activating details like name, address, etc. or a particular facility on his account. Or if the customer wants to add nominee to his account.
If the client/customer has any queries or situation related to stock order placed on the platform like order buy, delivery, intraday, limit, sell, stop loss, trade details, margin, etc.
If the client/customer has any queries or situation related to the brokerage or wants to modify brokerage details.
If the client/customer has any queries or situation related to charges applied.
If the client/customer has any queries or situation related to opening his account.
If the client/customer has any queries or situation related to details or deleting his account or updates regarding the onboarding status.
If the client/customer has any queries or situation related to mobile/web application of the platform.
If the client/customer has any queries or situation related to the OTP SMS.
If the client/customer has any queries or situation related to corporate actions like Bonus, buy back, Demerger/merger, Dividend, Right issue, etc.
If the client/customer has any queries or complaints regarding unauthorized trading activities or significant financial losses.
If the client/customer has any queries regarding the research or trading strategies.
If the client/customer has any queries or situation regarding reports.
